p: Scanning electron micrographs were obtained with a QUANTA 200 scanning electronic microscope (FEI Company, Hillsboro, OR, USA), at an accelerating voltage of 20 kV, which has an integrated EDX system, GENESIS XM 2i EDAX (FEI Company, Hillsboro, OR, USA) with a SUTW detector. The film surfaces were examined as such (without the metal coating), being recorded at different magnifications that are shown on the SEM images.
